trans-unit.source: Provides an HTTP handler for processing requests for script files that are embedded as resources in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en HTTP-behandling for å behandle forespørsler for skriptfiler som er innebygd som ressurser i en samling.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The ScriptResourceHandler class processes all requests for embedded script files that are referenced through the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ScriptResourceHandler behandler alle forespørsler om innebygde skriptfiler som det refereres til <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: The ScriptResourceHandler object retrieves the embedded script library and any localized resources for the script library.
trans-unit.target: Objektet ScriptResourceHandler henter innebygde skriptbiblioteket og lokaliserte ressurser for skriptbiblioteket.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.NotifyScriptLoaded%2A> property is set to `true`, the ScriptResourceHandler object adds a call at the end of the script file to the method of the object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.NotifyScriptLoaded%2A>er satt til `true`, ScriptResourceHandler objektet legger til en oppringing på slutten av skriptfilen metoden på objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.NotifyScriptLoaded%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the ScriptResourceHandler class compresses and caches embedded script files for Internet Explorer 7.
trans-unit.target: Som standard klassen ScriptResourceHandler komprimerer og bufrer innebygde skriptfiler for Internet Explorer 7.

trans-unit.source: You can turn compression and caching off through the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCompression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCaching%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection> class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan aktivere komprimering og hurtigbufring av gjennom <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCompression%2A>og <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCaching%2A>Egenskaper for <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection>klassen.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCaching%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCompression%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set these properties in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: Du angir egenskapene i Web.config-filen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can turn compression on for earlier versions of Internet Explorer by creating an alias for Internet Explorer 7 in the section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan aktivere komprimering for tidligere versjoner av Internet Explorer ved å opprette et alias for Internet Explorer 7 i delen i Web.config-filen.

trans-unit.source: You then programmatically set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientTarget%2A> property to that alias.
trans-unit.target: Du programmatisk sette verdien til den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientTarget%2A>egenskapen til dette aliaset.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientTarget%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, we do not recommend this approach because it will cause a decrease in performance and it introduces a high risk of errors.
trans-unit.target: Men anbefaler vi ikke denne tilnærmingen fordi den vil føre til redusert ytelse og det introduserer en høy risiko for feil.

trans-unit.source: The default Web.config file for AJAX-enabled ASP.NET Web applications adds the ScriptResourceHandler as a handler.
trans-unit.target: Standard Web.config-filen for AJAX-aktiverte webprogrammer for ASP.NET legger til ScriptResourceHandler som et behandlingsprogram.

trans-unit.source: You can manually add the handler to your application by including the following element in the Web.config file: ``` <httpHandlers> <add verb="GET,HEAD" path="ScriptResource.axd" type="System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler, System.Web.Extensions, Version=1.0.61025.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35" validate="false" /> </httpHandlers> ```
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til manuelt behandlingsprogrammet til programmet ved å ta med følgende element i Web.config-filen:``` <httpHandlers> <add verb="GET,HEAD" path="ScriptResource.axd" type="System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler, System.Web.Extensions, Version=1.0.61025.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35" validate="false" /> </httpHandlers> ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether another request can use the instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en ny forespørsel kan bruke forekomsten av klassen når overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, processes HTTP Web requests for a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, behandler forespørsler HTTP Web for skriptfilen som er innebygd som en ressurs i en samling.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Request" name="Request" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Response" name="Response" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""></xref>) that are used to service HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objekt som inneholder referanser til de innebygde serverobjektene (for eksempel <xref uid="langword_csharp_Request" name="Request" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Response" name="Response" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""> </xref>, og <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""> </xref>) som brukes til å behandle HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether another request can use the <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en ny forespørsel kan bruke den <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> </xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Processes HTTP Web requests for a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Behandler HTTP webforespørsler for skriptfilen som er innebygd som en ressurs i en samling.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> </xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Request" name="Request" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Response" name="Response" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""></xref>) that are used to service HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objekt som inneholder referanser til de innebygde serverobjektene (for eksempel <xref uid="langword_csharp_Request" name="Request" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Response" name="Response" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""> </xref>, og <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""> </xref>) som brukes til å behandle HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The type names for the debug and release versions of the embedded script do not match.
trans-unit.target: Typenavn for feilsøking og versjonen versjoner av innebygd skriptet samsvarer ikke.
